snippet: A casting director describes an hourslong wait in a dark stairwell and a refusal to consider women of color. Both charges have been denied....

headline.main: Holy Smokes! Israel Takes Step Toward Marijuana Reforms
headline.print_headline: Holy Smokes! Israel Takes Step Toward Marijuana Reforms

lead_paragraph: A casting director describes an hourslong wait in a dark stairwell and a refusal to consider women of color. Both charges have been denied.
